forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 25C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 76F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 22C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 71F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 21C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 70F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 22C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 71F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
